text: Bounds Green TMD (also known as Bounds Green Train Maintenance Centre) is a traction maintenance depot situated in Bounds Green, North London. The depot is to the immediate north of Alexandra Palace railway station. It is presently operated by Hitachi and maintains AT300 units for London North Eastern Railway and Hull Trains. ==History== In 1987, the depot had an allocation of Class 08s and HSTs and also maintained main line diesel locomotives. ==Allocation== *Class 08 *Class 91 *Class 800 *Class 801 *Class 802 ==References== ===Sources=== * * * ==Further reading== * ==External links== Category:Buildings and structures in the London Borough of Haringey Category:Railway depots in London
title: Bounds Green TMD
